room_title: Escape room "Fallout Shelter" by 11th Hour Escape in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: We just got back from the 11th Hour Escape and everyone had a really good time. We did the HARD level and made it out! I loved the elements of the escape room and were were really challenged. We look forward to doing another room soon!

room_title: Escape room "Fallout Shelter" by 11th Hour Escape in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: It was my first time doing something like this - didn't know what to expect. I was pleasantly surprised! It was a lot of fun and would highly recommend. My group had a blast even though we failed the challenge. Looking forward to trying out the next challenge! Thumbs up!!

room_title: Escape room "Fallout Shelter" by 11th Hour Escape in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Great fun. Very challenging. Incredibly friendly game masters. My family has been to several escape rooms and this was the first that offered different difficulty levels. We thought we were hot shots and went for "medium" difficulty. We died of course . Highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Fallout Shelter" by 11th Hour Escape in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: This was my first escape room. There were ten of us completing it on hard and we didn't survive, but we all had a blast. The theme of the room was great and well organized. Good layout, realistic props, etc. It was a good combination of trying to solve puzzles, find clues, and figure out the next step. Challenging but not frustrating! Good luck escaping!
